articles.title: Ukraine crisis latest: Joe Biden to send additional 3,000 troops to Eastern Europe - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Joe Biden has ordered the deployment of a further 3,000 American troops to Eastern Europe in the first major movement of US forces since the Ukraine crisis began.
articles.content:
A senior Russian official at the United Nations has  slammed British diplomacy, just hours before Boris Johnson speaks to Vladimir Putin to try to defuse the Ukraine crisis.

articles.author: Natasha Bertrand, Barbara Starr and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: US troops to deploy to Eastern Europe amid Ukraine crisis - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden has formally approved the deployment of 3,000 US troops to Poland, Germany and Romania, the Pentagon announced Wednesday, in a move to bolster NATO countries in Eastern Europe with tens of thousands of Russian troops amassed along Ukraine'…

articles.title: Canada relocated its military trainers in Ukraine in response to fears of Russian invasion - CBC News
articles.description: The Canadian military was forced to relocate about 30 per cent of its 200 trainers in Ukraine — including sniper instructors — because of the threat of a Russian invasion, says the Canadian commander on the ground in the eastern European country.

articles.title: EU commits €21-M aid for PHL, SEA recovery - Business Mirror
articles.description: ON January 28the European Commission announced an allocation of €21 million for disaster preparedness and humanitarian aid in the Philippines, Nepal and other Southeast Asian countries. The funding will support people affected by natural hazards, the pandemic…
